titleStmt.title: The lamentation of Melpomene, for the death of Belphæbe our late Queene With a ioy to England for our blessed King. / By T.W. Gentleman.
titleStmt.author: T. W., gentleman.

publicationStmt.publisher: By W. W[hite] for C. K[night] at the signe of the Holy Lambe in S. Paules Church-yarde,

notesStmt.note: Printer's and publisher's names from STC.
Running title reads: Melpomenes lamentation, for the death of Belphæbe.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.

place.placeName: the signe of the Holy Lambe in S. Paules Church-yarde
